name: 2D Platformer (Ronnit)
description:
Astro-Warrior's Adventures 

Join Astro-Warrior in his adventures across space and time. 
 (a 2D platformer game where you must collect items across the map to proceed to further levels)

Three modifications have been made as follows:

1- (Art modification) UI art has been changed according to developer's liking. UI button and UI layout page pixels have been changed using Paint software. 

2- (Design Modification) New level 2 (aka Parkour Platform) has been created which has been carefully designed in such a way that the player can only make it through if it is skilled at platforming/parkour and if it manages to discover the hidden mechanic ( jumping while running makes you jump farther).

3- (Creative story/design modification) New level 3 and level 4 have been created. Level 3 acts as a cutscene and provides information to the player that the tile art will now be used deceptively. This means that areas in level 4 which look like background might be foreground and vice-versa. The level 3 hints towards the lore that the player fell into a cosmic place that warps space and time to mess up the reality of the world.
